snippet: “The Grand Budapest Hotel” and “The Imitation Game” were named best original and adapted screenplay, respectively, at the Writers Guild of America Awards.
abstract: Director Wes Anderson's script for The Grand Budapest Hotel and Graham Moore's script for The Imitation Game are named best original and adapted screenplay at the Writers Guild of America Awards.
lead_paragraph: “The Grand Budapest Hotel” and “The Imitation Game” were named best original and adapted screenplay, respectively, at the Writers Guild of America Awards.

headline.print_headline: Writers Guild Chooses Top Screenplays of 2014
headline.main: Writers Guild Chooses Top Screenplays of 2014
